name: Peccadillo Pictures Ltd
goal: To distribute the best European Film and World Cinema titles to the UK and Republic of Ireland.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Education, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We regularly participate with Creative Europe and sometimes receives grants and support for our films.
